loginTitle: Log In To Manage Your Account
telegramInstruction: After logging in via the Telegram app, this page will update automatically.
deleteWarning: You can permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action is irreversible.
logoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
deleteSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted.
errorNotLoggedIn: You are not logged in or your session has expired. Please log in again.
errorGeneral: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
